CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
2011 – date Hywax GmbH (formerly Sasol Wax GmbH)  
 
March 2022 – present Hywax GmbH  
Position: Manager Strategic Sourcing Wax  
• Prokurist  
 
Jan 2015 – present  Sasol Wax GmbH  
Position: Manager Strategic Sourcing Wax & Phenolics Sasol  
• Management of the department Strategic Sourcing Wax & Phenolics for strategic raw materials, 
with five direct reports and a sourcing budget of approx. EUR 300m p.a.  
• Leadership of and intense contribution to international crossfunctional Strategic Sourcing 
projects  
 • Define, develop, negotiate and implement mid to long -term supply strategies for strategic raw 
materials to ensure suffic ient feedstock supply and competitiveness in the marketplace  
• Establish and maintain key business relationships with suppliers  
• Continuous company economics results improvement through responsible buying for complex, 
strategic and cross -site commodity gr oups considering logistics constraints  
• Continuous monitoring and analysis of international procurement markets and market trends  
 
Jan 2014 - Dec 2014  
Posit ion: Deputy Head of Raw Material Procurement  
• Involvement in mid to long -term raw material  supply strategies  
• Lead commercial support team  
• Price and quality conscious sourcing of raw materials taking into account relevant logistics and 
quality factors, as well as risk assessment on the basis of valid sourcing procedures and 
guidelines  
 
Aug 2011 - Dec 2013  
Position:  Buyer Raw Materials  
• Analysis of development of raw material quotations  
• Development and proposals of price formulas to existing and new suppliers  
• Focal point to Sales & Marketing in terms of price trends and raw materi al availability  
• Sourcing of Fisher Tropsch Waxes  
• Securing supply of raw materials for the satellite production plants  
• Developing, implementation and execution of base oil strategies and giving support from the 
analytical point of view  
 
Jan 2010 – July 2011 Airbus Operations GmbH  
Position:  Working Student – Investment Procurement in the Commodity Land & Buildings  
• Preparation and realization of contract negotiations  
• Preparation of strategic tender selection reports  
• Independent conduction of operational purchasing tasks fo r multi -million Airbus/ EADS Building 
projects.  
• Support of strategic building investment projects  
• Co-lead of multi -functional - teams  
 
Jul 2007 – Oct 2009 Kelly Services GmbH & Co. KG  
Position:  Working Student – Human Resources  
• Providing support to the HR re cruitment consultants  
 
 COMMENT  
 
Exper ience

Crossfunctional teamwork

• Perfomance driven
